Introduction

The solution involves the development of a front-end system on a windows desktop. The application is developed using 4.8 .NET Framework. Akka.Net for mutlithreading processing of excel and Email. SendGrid for sending bulk emails.

Main Features

  1. Sending of Bulk Email
  • Validate content of excel file.
  • Map Excel fields to Email fields.
  • Choose template for email to send.
  • Modify template for email sending.
  • Preview emails.
  • Bulk send emails.
  1. Templating
  • Create new email templates.
  • Modify existing templates.
  1. Report
  • Email sending audit for successful and failed mails.
  1. Admin Setting
  • Password proctected settings.
  • Configuration of Sengrid keys.

Technology Reference

Akka.Net https://petabridge.com/

Sendgrid https://sendgrid.com/
